channel.title: [Beta/Release Suggestion] In-game Themed Cursor
channel.description:
There's numerous games that change the default white, arrow type cursor to a fancy detailed cursor.
Well, my suggestion is relatively simple, a Throne of Lies in game cursor. :stuck_out_tongue: perhaps multiple, maybe some could even be sold as a cosmetic type item, like how Dota 2 does with cursor packs and such.

item.title: [Beta/Release Suggestion] In-game Themed Cursor
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
I mean, What Dota 2 does is they have a default custom cursor pack that is free and comes with the game, and then fancier ones that are relatively cheap still, but are purchasable as a add on second rate income for the devs

Read full topic
